languages.text: "Разумеется! В других имперских мирах вы можете встретить иные лики Императора и способы поклонения ему, но все мы верим в Единого".
"Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется! В других имперских мирах вы можете встретить иные лики Императора и способы поклонения ему, но все мы верим в Единого".

traits.locale_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."
"Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

"Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

languages.text: « Absolument ! La représentation de l'Empereur et le culte qui Lui est rendu adoptent toutes sortes de formes dans les mondes de l'Imperium, mais nous croyons tous en Lui et en Lui seul. »
languages.original_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument ! La représentation de l'Empereur et le culte qui Lui est rendu adoptent toutes sortes de formes dans les mondes de l'Imperium, mais nous croyons tous en Lui et en Lui seul. »

languages.text: «¡Indudablemente! El culto al Emperador presenta muy diversas formas en todos los mundos del Imperium, cada una con sus propias muestras de veneración, pero todos creemos en Él».
languages.original_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

traits.locale_text: «¡Indudablemente! El culto al Emperador presenta muy diversas formas en todos los mundos del Imperium, cada una con sus propias muestras de veneración, pero todos creemos en Él».

languages.text: “我非常肯定！在帝国的不同世界中，大家对帝皇的形象都有着各自的诠释，崇拜帝皇的方式也各自不同，但我们崇拜的都是唯一的真神。”
languages.original_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

traits.locale_text: “我非常肯定！在帝国的不同世界中，大家对帝皇的形象都有着各自的诠释，崇拜帝皇的方式也各自不同，但我们崇拜的都是唯一的真神。”

languages.text: 「もちろんです！皇帝の似姿や崇拝の仕方は、帝国の各世界でさまざまに見られますが、我々は皆、唯一なるものを信じているのです」
languages.original_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです！皇帝の似姿や崇拝の仕方は、帝国の各世界でさまざまに見られますが、我々は皆、唯一なるものを信じているのです」

languages.text: "Gewiss! Auf den vielen Welten des Imperiums finden sich unterschiedliche Bildnisse des Imperators und unterschiedliche Arten, ihn zu verehren, doch wir alle glauben an den Einen."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."

traits.locale_text: "Gewiss! Auf den vielen Welten des Imperiums finden sich unterschiedliche Bildnisse des Imperators und unterschiedliche Arten, ihn zu verehren, doch wir alle glauben an den Einen."

languages.text: "Şüphesiz! İmparator'un farklı suretleri ve O'na farklı tapınma biçimleri İmparatorluk'un birçok dünyasında görülmekte ancak nihayetinde hepimiz O'na inanırız."
languages.original_text: "Most certainly! Different likenesses of the Emperor and ways of worshipping Him can be found across the Imperium's worlds, but we all believe in the One."
